bridge-type.label: sACN/E1.31 Bridge
bridge-type.description: The sACN/E1.31 bridge represents a single DMX universe connected via sACN/E1.31

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Receiver Address(es)
parameter.description: Network addresses of sACN/E1.31 receivers, format: address[:port][, address[:port], ...]. Default port is 5568.

parameter.name: localaddress
parameter.label: Local Network Address
parameter.description: Network address of the sending host, format: address[:port]. Default port is 0 (random)

parameter.name: refreshmode
parameter.label: Refresh mode
parameter.description: Suppress re-transmission and refresh every 800ms or send every packet.

parameter.name: applycurve
parameter.label: Apply Curve
parameter.description: List of channels that should use LED dim curve. Format is channel[,channel, ...] or channel[/width].
